import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Experiencia } from 'src/app/model/experiencia'; import { SExperienciaService } from 'src/app/service/s-experiencia.service'; import { TokenService } from 'src/app/service/token.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-experiencia', templateUrl: './experiencia.component.html', styleUrls: ['./experiencia.component.css'] }) export class ExperienciaComponent implements OnInit{ expe: Experiencia[] = []; constructor(private sExperiencia: SExperienciaService, private tokenService: TokenService){} isLogged = false; ngOnInit(): void { this.cargarExperiencia(); if(this.tokenService.getToken()){ this.isLogged = true; } else{ this.isLogged = false; } } cargarExperiencia():void{ this.sExperiencia.lista().subscribe(data => {this.expe = data;} ) } }
